May 27, 1950 D Belle Vue May Contest (Class A)
Belle Vue May Contest (Class A) 110 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival belle-vue-may-contest-class-a
Academic Festival Overture
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Open to bands who had not won a cash prize exceeding £21 at the Belle Vue Contests in 1947, 1948 and 1949. 1st prize £25 and £100 Guinea Gold Championship Challenge Cup. 2nd prize £15. 3rd prize £10. 4th prize £6. 5th prize £4. 20th annual contest
May 6, 2011, 8:45 p.m. March 7, 2019, 9:44 a.m.
